Title: Shades of Darkness
Writer: Ian Adema (screenplay), Ian Adema (story), Ian Adema
Actors: Deanne August, Jordan Matlock, Herman Stern, Russell Subiono
Plot: When a man wakes up in the forest, he doesn't remember how he got there or much of his past. But he quickly discovers he is in a dream world of eternal night ruled by a race of creatures called Planeshifters (the Dream Masters).
